hero.title: Share Files Across Devices Effortlessly
hero.subtitle: CrossSend makes sharing files, media, and text between your devices simple with no apps needed on the receiving end.

list.title: No App Required for Receivers
list.description: Just one device needs CrossSend installed. All others can use their web browser.

list.title: Local Network Only
list.description: Your data never leaves your local network, ensuring maximum privacy and security.

list.title: Cross-Platform
list.description: Works seamlessly across iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, and Linux.

list.title: Fast Transfers
list.description: Transfer files at the maximum speed your local network allows.

steps.title: Install on One Device
steps.description: Install CrossSend on at least one of your devices.

steps.title: Connect to Same Network
steps.description: Ensure all devices are on the same local network.

steps.title: Scan or Enter URL
steps.description: Scan the QR code or enter the displayed URL on receiving devices.

steps.title: Start Sharing
steps.description: Instantly share files, text, or media between devices.
